title: Fitness Metaverse: This Tech Company Trades Sweat For Crypto And NFTs - Forbes
content: Fitness Metaverse: This Tech Company Trades Sweat For Crypto And NFTs  Forbes
description: OliveX wants you to earn while you burn. The Hong Kong-based digital fitness company rewards players with crypto and NFTs as they flee marauding pirates and monsters across a dystopian wasteland.
